titleStmt.title: The bonny Scot: or, The yielding lass. To an excellent new tune. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for E. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball in Pye-Corner.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "As I sate at my spinning-wheel ..."
Imperfect: sheet cut and mounted; mutilated, affecting imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
